Logging on as a Different User

Sometimes you may need to log on with a different user name. For example, you may need to log on separately as an individual and as a QA team leader.

If you are already logged onto a server configuration or the Toolbar, but wish to log on as a different user, you must click the Log On As button. In server configuration lists, your current logon appears in parentheses after the name of the server. These lists appear in the New Project Wizard, the Open Project Wizard, the Server Administration dialog, and the Server Administration Tool.

If you are logging on to a server for the first time, but have the Toolbar running, the user name in parentheses is recognized by the Toolbar as your default set of credentials. If this is not the name you wish to use, you must change it.

To log on as a different user:

  1. From an appropriate dialog box or window, select the server configuration you wish to access.

  2. Click the Log On As button. The Log On to dialog box opens.

  3. Type the alternate user name in the User name text box and the password in the Password text box.

  4. (Optional) Select the Save as default credentials for this server check box if you wish to reset your default credentials for this server configuration to this user name and password. This name will then appear in parentheses after the server configuration name in lists.
